title: Requirement Document
content:
# 1. Document Control & Versioning
**Author**: Idea-to-Deploy Platform
**Date**: 2025-12-26
**Version**: 1.0.0 (Baseline)

# 2. Project Background & Objectives
This project, **Generate code with a README file included.**, is designed to deliver a high-quality solution in the **General Web Application** domain. The primary objective is to streamline operations and provide value through specialized features.

# 3. Stakeholder Identification
- **Project Sponsor**: Idea-to-Deploy Platform
- **Technical Lead**: AI Architect
- **End Users**: Users interacting with General Web Application services.

# 4. Assumptions & Constraints
- **Assumption**: Scalable cloud infrastructure is available for deployment.
- **Constraint**: Delivery within a 12-week timeframe as per standard PMP guidelines.

# 5. In-Scope / Out-of-Scope
- **In-Scope**: Implementation of User Registration, Login, Logout and core General Web Application logic.
- **Out-of-Scope**: Physical hardware procurement and third-party legacy data cleaning.

# 6. Functional Requirements
## REQ-001: User Registration
The system shall provide robust User Registration capabilities to support the core functionality of Generate code with a README file included..

## REQ-002: Login
The system shall provide robust Login capabilities to support the core functionality of Generate code with a README file included..

## REQ-003: Logout
The system shall provide robust Logout capabilities to support the core functionality of Generate code with a README file included..

## REQ-004: Forgot Password
The system shall provide robust Forgot Password capabilities to support the core functionality of Generate code with a README file included..

## REQ-005: Profile Management
The system shall provide robust Profile Management capabilities to support the core functionality of Generate code with a README file included..

# 7. Non-Functional Requirements
- **NFR-001 (Performance)**: The Generate code with a README file included. system must load within 2 seconds.
- **NFR-002 (Security)**: All data for General Web Application must be encrypted at rest and in transit.

# 8. User Roles & Permissions
- **Admin**: Full access to manage the Generate code with a README file included. platform.
- **Standard User**: Access to core General Web Application features.

# 9. Business Rules
Data integrity must be maintained across all **General Web Application** transactions.

# 10. Use Cases / User Stories
- **US-001**: As a user, I want to use User Registration so that I can achieve my task in Generate code with a README file included..

# 11. UI/UX & Screen References
The interface will follow modern design principles tailored for the **General Web Application** industry.

# 12. Data Requirements
Relational database storage optimized for **General Web Application** data entities.

# 13. Regulatory & Compliance Requirements
Compliance with industry standards relevant to **General Web Application** and GDPR.

# 14. Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM)
Linking all functional requirements (REQ-001 to REQ-005) to business objectives.

title: Project Planning Document
content:
# 1. Project Overview
Project **Generate code with a README file included.** is a Simple complexity project in the **General Web Application** sector.

# 2. Project Governance Structure
Strict PMP-based governance with a Project Manager overseeing the implementation of Generate code with a README file included..

# 3. Project Organization & Roles
- **Project Manager**: Managing the 12-week schedule.
- **Developers**: Implementing User Registration, Login, Logout, Forgot Password, Profile Management.

# 4. Project Methodology (Agile)
Agile Scrum methodology with 2-week sprints to iterate on **Generate code with a README file included.** features.

# 5. Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)
- **Phase 1**: Initial Analysis & General Web Application Domain Research
- **Phase 2**: Development of User Registration, Login, Logout
- **Phase 3**: Integration of remaining features
- **Phase 4**: Final Testing & Deployment of Generate code with a README file included.

# 6. Deliverables & Milestones
- **MS-1**: Requirement Sign-off (Week 2)
- **MS-2**: General Web Application MVP Completion (Week 8)
- **MS-3**: Final Handover of **Generate code with a README file included.** (Week 12)

# 7. Resource Planning
Engineers specializing in **General Web Application** technology stack and cloud architects.

# 8. Communication Management Plan
Bi-weekly status meetings regarding **Generate code with a README file included.** progress.

# 9. Change Management Plan
Standard change request process for any scope adjustments in the **Generate code with a README file included.** roadmap.

# 10. Dependency Management
Depends on the completion of the core **General Web Application** engine.

# 11. Assumptions & Constraints
Assumes availability of General Web Application domain experts for validation.
